title: Jon Wright
text: Don't let letting agent rip you off any longer! I honestly believe the value of this contact to our business runs into Â£10000's. but more importantly it saves us stress and gives us peace of mind, knowing no matter what is around the corner as landlords we have one association that truly understands and is there to help us survive the choppy waters out there. Keep up the great work! All the best
